titleStmt.title: A prayer for the prosperous proceedings and good successe of the Earle of Essex and his companies, in their present expedition in Ireland against Tyrone and his adherents, rebels there. Fit to be vsed of all loyall subiects, as well in that countrie, as in England. / By Iohn Norden..
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

notesStmt.note: Title vignette of royal arms; head- and tail-pieces, initials.
Former owner's autograph on t.p.: Hum: Dyson.
The copy of this item at reel 2340:3k in eleventh of a group of twelve items bound and filmed together.
Imperfect: leaves cropped at foot, with loss of signatures and some loss of print; some print show-through.
Reproductions of original in the British Library.
